text: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day. An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day. An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day. An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day. An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: My life is like a stroll upon the beach, As near the ocean's edge as I can go. My life is like a stroll upon the beach, As near the ocean's edge as I can go. author: Henry David Thoreau
